as.leap

Class LCUserManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • as.leap.LCUserManager

  • public final class LCUserManager
extends java.lang.Object
    * This class provides the ability to manage the LCUser.

      • signUpInBackground

        public static void signUpInBackground(LCUser user,
                                      SignUpCallback callback)
        Signs up a new user. A username and password must be set before calling signUp.
        Parameters:
        user - the user
        callback - callback.done(user, e) is called when the signUp completes.

      • logInInBackground

        public static void logInInBackground(java.lang.String username,
                                     java.lang.String password,
                                     LogInCallback<LCUser> callback)
        Logs in a user with a username and password. On success, this saves the session to disk, so you can retrieve the currently logged in user using LCUser.getCurrentUser()
        Parameters:
        username - The username to log in with.
        password - The password to log in with.
        callback - callback.done(user, e) is called when the login completes.

      • logInInBackground

        public static <T extends LCUser> void logInInBackground(java.lang.String username,
                                                        java.lang.String password,
                                                        java.lang.Class<T> clazz,
                                                        LogInCallback<T> callback)
        Logs in a user with a username and password. On success, this saves the session to disk, so you can retrieve the currently logged in user using LCUser.getCurrentUser()
        Parameters:
        username - The username to log in with.
        password - The password to log in with.
        clazz - a class inherits LCUser
        callback - callback.done(user, e) is called when the login completes.

      • requestPasswordResetInBackground

        public static void requestPasswordResetInBackground(java.lang.String email,
                                                    RequestPasswordResetCallback callback)
        Requests a password reset email to be sent in a background thread to the specified email address associated with the user account. This email allows the user to securely reset their password on the LC site.
        Parameters:
        email - The email address associated with the user that forgot their password.
        callback - callback.done(e) is called when the request completes.

      • requestEmailVerifyInBackground

        public static void requestEmailVerifyInBackground(java.lang.String email,
                                                  RequestEmailVerifyCallback callback)
        Requests a verify email to be sent in a background thread.
        Parameters:
        email - The email address for verifying.
        callback - callback.done(e) is called when the request completes.

      • becomeInBackground

        public static void becomeInBackground(java.lang.String sessionToken,
                                      LogInCallback<LCUser> callback)
        Authorize a user with a session token. On success, this saves the session to disk, so you can retrieve the currently logged in user using LCUser.getCurrentUser()
        Parameters:
        sessionToken - The session token to authorize with.
        callback - callback.done(user, e) is called when the authorization completes.

      • checkPasswordInBackground

        public static void checkPasswordInBackground(java.lang.String username,
                                             java.lang.String password,
                                             CheckPasswordCallback callback)
        Check if the password matches the username in a background thread.
        Parameters:
        username - the username
        password - the password
        callback - callback.done(e) is called when the request completes.

      • checkUsernameExistInBackground

        public static void checkUsernameExistInBackground(java.lang.String username,
                                                  ValidateUsernameCallback callback)
        Check if the username has already registered on the server in a background thread.
        Parameters:
        username - the username
        callback - callback.done(e) is called when the request completes.

      • changePasswordInBackground

        public static void changePasswordInBackground(java.lang.String username,
                                              java.lang.String oldPassword,
                                              java.lang.String newPassword,
                                              ChangePasswordCallback callback)
        Change the password in a background thread.
        Parameters:
        username - the username
        oldPassword - the old password
        newPassword - the new password
        callback - callback.done(e) is called when the request completes.
